page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {Farming}is obviously the main occupation within the block. However {tourism}is also a source of income vital to the survival of some farms. Higher Knapp Farm (152949) offers{Bed {and Breakfast}and in the summer runs a {caravan site}on one of its fields. There is also a temporary Caravan Club site near Magpie Cottage (144942). Bernard's farm (143933) has been partly converted to a{Hotel and {Restaurant. The large private houses provide much local employment for gardeners and odd job men. The woodland must also provide some employment however many people will{commute}out of the block to jobs in nearby towns. The closure of Sidmouth town tip at Lower Knapp is the most recent job losses to the block.
